item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, January 16, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Nvidia might do for desktop AI what it did for desktop gaming (33 points | 10 comments)
2. 100x defect tolerance: How we solved the yield problem (144 points | 89 comments)
3. I have made the decision to disband Hindenburg Research (329 points | 121 comments)
4. Why is Cloudflare Pages' bandwidth unlimited? (416 points | 261 comments)
5. OpenAI Fails to Deliver Opt-Out System for Photographers (130 points | 50 comments)
6. dnSpyEx: .NET debugger and assembly editor (89 points | 11 comments)
7. Ropey – A UTF8 text rope for manipulating and editing large text (200 points | 81 comments)
8. Why the weak nuclear force is short range (300 points | 147 comments)
9. Google is making AI in Gmail and Docs free, but raising the price of Workspace (156 points | 195 comments)
10. Lambda Calculus in 383 Bytes (2022) (246 points | 41 comments)
11. Code reviews: A success story (50 points | 39 comments)
12. Modern JavaScript for Django developers (161 points | 93 comments)
13. Show HN: I built a fair alternative to Product Hunt for indie makers (120 points | 38 comments)
14. Sweden brings more books and handwriting practice back to its schools (2023) (314 points | 210 comments)
15. Empirical Health (YC S23) is hiring interns to build data-driven primary care ( | hide)
16. Nobody cares (344 points | 339 comments)
17. Apache DataFusion (44 points | 14 comments)
18. My 3D SWE Portfolio - Built with React Three Fiber. (9 points | 9 comments)
19. Israel, Hamas reach ceasefire deal to end 15 months of war in Gaza (195 points | 339 comments)
20. Sky-scanning complete for Gaia (148 points | 42 comments)
21. TikTok preparing for U.S. shut-off on Sunday (525 points | 1450 comments)
22. US will ban cancer-linked Red Dye No. 3 in cereal and other foods (286 points | 435 comments)
23. Homomorphic encryption in iOS 18 (326 points | 177 comments)
24. Sutton Hoo and Syria: Anglo-Saxons who served in the Byzantine army? (22 points | 6 comments)
25. Arnold's Cat (2018) (28 points | 5 comments)
26. Scheduled tasks in ChatGPT (103 points | 54 comments)
27. Take the pedals off the bike (417 points | 410 comments)
28. Docker Desktop Broken on Mac OS Update for over a Week (6 points | 3 comments)
29. Natrium 'advanced nuclear' power plant wins Wyoming permit (83 points | 50 comments)
30. TSMC begins producing 4-nanometer chips in Arizona (379 points | 323 comments)
